name: Activity Selection
description: Selects the maximum number of non-overlapping activities by always choosing the earliest finishing activity first.

name: Huffman Coding
description: Builds an optimal prefix code tree for data compression by repeatedly merging the two least frequent nodes.

name: Fractional Knapsack
description: Maximizes total value by taking items with the highest value-to-weight ratio, possibly taking fractional parts of items.

name: Job Scheduling
description: Assigns jobs to maximize profit with deadlines, typically sorting jobs by profit and using a greedy allocation strategy.
